text: Romney Presbyterian Church is a historic Presbyterian church in Romney, West Virginia. ==Location== The church is located at 100 West Rosemary Lane in Romney, West Virginia.Presbyterian Church (U.S.A.): Romney Presbyterian Church ==History== The church building was erected in 1860.Romney Presbyterian Church During the American Civil War of 1861-1865, it was used both as a stable and a hospital for the Confederate States Army. ==References== == External links == Category:1860 establishments in Virginia Category:American Civil War hospitals Category:Buildings and structures in Romney, West Virginia Category:Churches completed in 1860 Category:Churches in Hampshire County, West Virginia Category:Hampshire County, West Virginia, in the American Civil War Category:Military history of the Confederate States of America Category:Presbyterian Church (USA) churches Category:Presbyterian Church in the United States churches Category:Presbyterian churches in West Virginia
title: Romney Presbyterian Church
